root.name: The Irritating Maze
root.description: OverviewThe Irritating Maze is one of the few games on the Neo Geo hardware that wasn't released in the home-based AES format. Dedicated cabinets have bright, flashing lights that surround the screen and an air blower. When you fail and "get shocked" in the game, the lights flash and a burst of air is shot up into your face to simulate the effect. It is the only Neo Geo game to require a trackball, which in turn requires a separate BIOS setup that prevents "normal" Neo Geo games from working properly.The game is also compatible with a card printer that prints the player's path through the final course--assuming the player completes the final course, that is.
